A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very enjoyable experience. I know people may not enjoy the evolution of the series but it actually hit on some great concepts and touched on struggles we can all relate to. The storyline and pacing wasn't perfect\, but they didn't try to over-polish things and were not afraid to take risks (doing the unexpected)! I like that. it's bold and very much needed in an age of predictable sequels.
